Class Suco_Cache_File

Suco_Cache_File

public class Suco_Cache_File

Suco_Cache_File, 文件缓存

Version:
3.0 2009/09/01
Author:
Eric Yu (blueflu@live.cn)
Copyright:
Copyright (c) 2009, Suconet, Inc.
License:
http://www.suconet.com/license -----------------------------------------------------------
Example:
$cache = new Suco_Cache_File(); if (!$data = $cache->load('block_id')) { $cache->save('test content...', 3600); } echo $data;
